member.name: T:BerwickHeights.Platform.Email.IEmailDeliverySvc
member.summary: Interface to a service that sends email to an SMTP server for delivery.
Delivers given message to the configured SMTP server.
member.param: The message body for the email.
Whether or not the message body is in HTML format.
An optional list of people to receive a copy of the message. Set to null if not applicable to the email message.
An optional list of people to receive a blind copy of the message. Set to null if not applicable to the email message.
An optional list of attached files for the message. Set to null if email message as no attachments.
